author: ryanleeschneider
content: whats the easiest tool to use to generate some blob txs?  I want to make sure our systems are handling them end-to-end on goerli

author: parithosh
content: we maintain this in case its useful: https://github.com/ethpandaops/goomy-blob

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Awesome thanks this worked perfectly.  For others if you need to send a quick blob tx you can use: `go run cmd/blob-sender/main.go -r <RPC node> --random-privkey -b "random::256"`.  Obviously w/ a random privkey you're not going to actually send the tx but you can confirm you node returns insufficient gas (in my case I just wanted to double check that our proxy fronting our nodes that accept `eth_sendRawTransaction` was fully handling blob txs).  you can also use `-p <privkey>` if you have a funded throw-away key you want to use.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: BTW once you can remove the `replace` directive and use upstream geth then `go install github.com/ethpandaops/goomy-blob/cmd/blob-sender@latest` would work w/o needing to clone the repo.
